Summary: Circular with four bright wight lights in diamond shape came over trees veered and slowly and silently went out of sight
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around May 25th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi have been seeing multi colored stationary lights for at least a month - what i thought were stars - very pretty- even searched online for stars emitting colors with no luck- so i was out looking for where these where when a craft witch at first i thought was a plane, but noticed as it got closer it had four very bright white lights in a diamond shape and there was no sound so i continued to watch and as it got closer, many more colored lights in a cicular outline in with the four bright lights where then coming into view- thought about snapping pic with my phone but the moon doesn't even show up on that- i watched it slowly veer and continue on slowly south and out of view don't know what it was even went online to aircraft lights to see if i could find anything similar with no luck...i will be out tonight again to watch the reaccuring colored stars\orbs that first got my attention...:)
